title: Ram nuam kan hmuh ngai loh a awm
lyrics:
Ram nuam kan hmuh ngai loh a awm,
Ram nuamah chuan kalah min sawm
Chumi ram nuam chu a eng em em,
Ram nuam kal khawmna tur a ni.

	Hmangaihna ram, eng leh lawmna,
	Chutah hrehawmna a awm lo;
	Chumi ram nuam chu kan chang ang,
	Kan khawvel ni a kin hunah.

Chu ram nuam mawi takah chuanin,
Hrehawm reng reng a awm ngai lo;
Chu ramah chuan hmun tina mi,
Lawm em emin kan intawk ang.

Angel zaina thianghlimah chuan,
Lei hrehawmna a awm tawh lo;
Chutah ni chhuah a ngai tawh lo,
Chatuanin a eng reng fo vang.

Chutah tah leh hrehawm a bo,
Chatuan hmun nuam chawlhna ramah;
Vakvaiten in nuam an chang ang,
Pathian Paradis mawiah chuan.
